name: X'O Clock News
description:
The X'O Clock news is about abnormal weather and the media.

Abnormal weathr continues to occur in cities. We need to quickly take a picture of the abnormal weather and report it.


Sometimes the building turns black. The building pollutes the environment by creating garbage. Report it so that citizens don't squirt snow.
Sometimes they come to you to ask you a favor.

There is no need to control the keyboard.

environmental pollution Report abnormal climate Report Camera Change
